name: Dawnshroud
passive: Daybreak: After not taking damage for 4 seconds, your next ability deals 20% increased damage and grants a shield for 3 seconds.
description: Item that provides Ability Power, Magic Resist, Armor. Passive effect: After not taking damage for 4 seconds, your next ability deals 20% increased damage and grants a shield for 3 seconds.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Perfect for enhancing your team's capabilities
Helps protect and empower your carries
The active/passive effect can turn the tide of team fights
Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
